description: In the heart of Vienna, a series of art thefts have left the city in turmoil. As whispers of a notorious art thief resurface, you must navigate through a web of deception and intrigue. Each suspect holds a piece of the puzzle, but only one is the true mastermind behind the heists. Can you unravel the clues hidden in their stories and catch the elusive thief before they vanish into the night?

reasoning_chain: Identify the common trait of the woman with the red scarf across multiple locations.
Link the sketching hobby to the art thefts and the suspect's background.
Eliminate other suspects based on mismatched traits and motives.

solution: Connect the clues about the woman with the red scarf and her sketching hobby to identify Elena Novak as the mastermind behind the art thefts.

suspect_database.background: An aspiring artist with a passion for classical art.
suspect_database.motive: Desires recognition in the art world.
suspect_database.name: Elena Novak

suspect_database.background: A wealthy collector with a shady past.
suspect_database.motive: Wants to expand his collection at any cost.
suspect_database.name: Marek Kral

suspect_database.background: A photographer who often captures art events.
suspect_database.name: Lukas Schmidt

suspect_database.background: A chef with a love for art.
suspect_database.motive: Wants to create a fusion of art and cuisine.
suspect_database.name: Anna Weiss

title: Shadows of the Past
